content:
Sure! Here are twenty trivia questions and answers that could fit under the category "Auto shows and events":

1. What is the oldest and largest auto show in the world?
* The International Motor Show, also known as the Frankfurt Motor Show, is the oldest and largest auto show in the world. It has been held annually in Frankfurt, Germany since 1897.
1. What is the largest auto show in the United States?
* The North American International Auto Show, also known as the Detroit Auto Show, is the largest auto show in the United States. It has been held annually in Detroit, Michigan since 1907.
1. What is the largest auto show in Asia?
* The Auto China show is the largest auto show in Asia. It is held biennially in Beijing, China.
1. What is the largest auto show in Europe?
* The Paris Motor Show, also known as the Salon de l'Automobile, is the largest auto show in Europe. It has been held biennially in Paris, France since 1898.
1. What is the largest auto show in South America?
* The Sao Paulo International Motor Show, also known as the Salao do Automovel, is the largest auto show in South America. It is held biennially in Sao Paulo, Brazil.
1. What is the largest auto show in the Middle East?
* The Dubai International Motor Show is the largest auto show in the Middle East. It is held biennially in Dubai, United Arab Emirates.
1. What is the largest auto show in Australia?
* The Australian International Motor Show, also known as the Sydney Motor Show, is the largest auto show in Australia. It is held biennially in Sydney, Australia.
1. What is the largest auto show in Africa?
* The Johannesburg International Motor Show is the largest auto show in Africa. It is held biennially in Johannesburg, South Africa.
1. What is the largest auto show in Canada?
* The Canadian International AutoShow is the largest auto show in Canada. It is held annually in Toronto, Ontario.
1. What is the largest auto show in the United Kingdom?
